message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
You wanted a 60/40 split, I'll give you 30, now it's your turn to be generous!
Okay, I see your point.  Let's compromise - 40/60 in your favor.  It's still a good deal for both of us!
You're getting desperate, I can see. I'm not going to give you 40, but I'll give you 20, it's the least I can do!
